item.title: Hugo Content Management
item.description: 名词 Page resources – images, other pages, documents, etc. – have page-relative URLs and their own metadata. Page Bundles are a way to group Page Resources. Page Bundle definition A Page Bundle can be one of: Leaf Bundle(leaf means it has no children) Branch Bundle(home page, section, taxonomy terms, taxonomy list) examples content/ ├── about(Leaf Bundle) │ ├── index.md ├── posts │ ├── my-post(Leaf Bundle) │ │ ├── content1.
